metadata.title: CVE-2021-38593 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Qt 5.x before 5.15.6 and 6.x through 6.1.2 has an out-of-bounds write inQOutlineMapper::convertPath (called from QRasterPaintEngine::fill andQPaintEngineEx::stroke).

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtbase-opensource-src-gles: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
